description: A ripe avocado yields to gentle pressure when squeezed. Rich, creamy texture and buttery flavor. Perfect for guacamole, sandwiches, and salads.
Creamy and distinct in flavor, goat cheese is a dairy product enjoyed on its own or in cooking. This cheese is made from goat and sheep milk.
Fresh broccoli with a robust, earthy flavor. High in fiber and has anti-inflammatory properties. Great steamed or roasted.
